turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hey. I was wondering if you could help me make an order at Starbucks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, what would you like to order?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: would you like any whipped cream?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, which location would you like to pick up from?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: It's the Starbucks in Atlanta on 14th Street.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, you are ordering a venti hot chocolate from the starbucks on 14th street in atlanta, is that correct?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great, your drink will be ready in 5 minutes and your receipt will be texted to you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: your welcome, enjoy your hot chocolate.
